title: Spotlights: Jan Chapman
brief_description: Jan Chapman is an Australian film producer, who has produced some of our most beloved and critically acclaimed films, including The Last Days of Chez Nous (1992), The Piano (1993), Love Serenade (1996), Holy Smoke! (1999) and Lantana (2001).

constellations_primary.name: Jan Chapman
constellations_primary.description: From an independent Sydney cinema to the world's stage, Jan Chapman's work has many connections to the Australian film scene and Hollywood.

description: Jan Chapman is an Australian film producer, who has produced some of our most beloved and critically acclaimed films, including The Last Days of Chez Nous (1992), The Piano (1993), Love Serenade (1996), Holy Smoke! (1999) and Lantana (2001).
